metadata.synopsis: Wyll STRONGLY warns you he might leave the party because your relationship status is getting low.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe debugbookadd companion > add wyll > I understandctrl+shft character. This will give you their ID name on bottom left of screenin recon: changeApprovalRating S_Player_Wyll [Character ID] -20x2eg: changeApprovalRating S_Player_Wyll HALFELVES_Female_Wood_Player -20

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: You're different than I thought. At first I thought it was the parasite. Now... now, I don't know what to think.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: Either you're changing, or I am. I'm not a betting man, but my coin's on the latter.

3.speaker: Wyll
3.text: I thought our connection meant something to you. Certainly, it did to me.

2.speaker: Wyll
2.text: I see now it was naught but a fantasy. I will fight at your side. But I can give no more than that.

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *Your parasites connect. Wyll's doubts grip you, then relax.*
